mapper.select: SELECT PAY_ID , PAY_SUM , PAY_DATE , PAY_NY , MEM_ID , SD_ID , PAY_CASH , PAY_CARD , SHIPLIST_ID FROM PAY WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOT_CNT , PAY_ID , PAY_SUM , PAY_DATE , PAY_NY , MEM_ID , SD_ID , PAY_CASH , PAY_CARD , SHIPLIST_ID FROM PAY WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} ORDER BY pay_date DESC) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 AND #{page}*#{pageSize}
